data.text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE:

Bo2 Productions, A. Fuller Entertainment and Sandra Terry Present Donald Gray’s “There’s A Stranger In My House” at the Edward C. Smith Civic Center

LEXINGTON, NC – July 20, 2024 – Bo2 Productions, A. Fuller Entertainment, and Sandra Terry are excited to announce the upcoming production of Donald Gray’s captivating stage play, “There’s A Stranger In My House,” at the Edward C. Smith Civic Center on Saturday, September 7, 2024.

Known for his storytelling, Donald Gray brings to life a gripping narrative that explores the complexities of relationships and the startling discoveries that can alter lives forever.

Donald Gray, a seasoned playwright and director, has earned national acclaim with works such as “A Good Man is Hard to Find,” “After the Love has Gone,” and “Shh! Don’t Tell,” among others. His career has been marked by powerful performances and thought-provoking productions that resonate deeply with audiences.

We are thrilled to bring “There’s A Stranger In My House” to our hometown of Lexington and showcase the talents of Donald Gray and his exceptional cast. The production features performances by Gary “Lil’ G” Jenkins (R&B Recording Group “Silk”), Javon Johnson (Tyler Perry/BET’s “The Oval”) and Lowell Pye (Gospel Recording Artist “Men of Standard”).

Through collaborations with local churches and businesses, our goal is to foster unity, bridge divides, and demonstrate that our community can come together for an evening filled with inspiration, laughter, mystery, intrigue, and excitement.

In addition to entertaining audiences, Bo2 Productions, A. Fuller Entertainment and Sandra Terry are committed to bringing national exposure to Lexington, Piedmont/Triad areas and giving back to the community. A portion of the event’s proceeds will support the “Lexington Gators,” a local

501C-3 non-profit organization dedicated to youth sports and cheer teams. This initiative reflects our shared values of community engagement and empowerment.

Join us for a special welcome reception and “Meet and Greet” hosted by Comedian An-G of Lexington on Friday, September 6, 2024, at 6:30 pm at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites at the Vineyards. This event offers an opportunity to mingle with Director, Donald Gray along with cast members, nationals (Javon Johnson, Gary “Lil’ G” Jenkins and Lowell Pye) and our sponsors.

For more information and to purchase tickets, please visit EventBrite or contact Lenora Bobo at (336) 470-8388 or lenorabo2@yahoo.com.

Don’t miss this unforgettable evening of theatre and community celebration!
